snippet: Mitt Romney’s participation in a law-and-business degree program at Harvard put him into one of the most exclusive clubs in academe.
abstract: Mitt Romney’s participation in a tiny law-and-business dual-degree graduate program at Harvard University, which has graduated a striking number of big names in finance, industry, law and government since it began in 1969, puts him into one of the most exclusive clubs in academe.

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s participation in a law-and-business degree program at Harvard put him into one of the most exclusive clubs in academe.

headline.seo: Romney Merged Law and Business at Harvard
headline.main: Romney, at Harvard, Merged Two Worlds
headline.print_headline: Romney, at Harvard, Merged Two Worlds
